value.description:
A self-loading large-bore cannon. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets. An integrated ammunition factory contributes to the bulk but means it does not need bullets, rather using raw steel.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

This weapon has a limited magazine and must be reloaded with steel.

Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged. It's slow to aim and it cannot fire at close-up targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

Has limited magazine of 5 shells and must be reloaded with mortar shells.

A powerful, military-grade flamer based on mechanoid inferno spewers. It can cover the entire area in front of the user in flames.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

Has a limited fuel tank which must be refilled with chemfuel.

A rocket launcher that fires ten small-bore explosive missiles that track different targets.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

Can only hold a limited number of missiles, and must be reloaded with swarm missiles after two firing cycles.

A self-loading uranium slug cannon. Its ultra-dense uranium shells can punch through heavy armor. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up. An integrated ammunition factory contributes to the bulk but means it does not need bullets, rather using raw uranium.

Being an extremely heavy weapon, this gun requires a power armor to be effectively used.

Has a limited magazine and must be reloaded with uranium after ten shots.
